label: 治天の君
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: The headship of the imperial house. Used especially during the late Kamakura period when the imperial house was divided into competing branches (Daikakuji and Jimyōin), and the senior authority needed to be designated.　[大覚寺統、持明院統]
